comment.author: 24231207@N07
comment._content:
Carl Jorn was a tenor at the Met. Adam Didur was a bass at the Met.

Carl Jorn divorced publicly in 1910, remarried in 1911 and sailed for Europe.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: They both arrived from Europe on the Kaiser Wilhelm on November 12, 1913. Also on board were Caruso and several other opera singers. See NYT of Nov 13, 1913 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9D03EFD71E3EE233A...
